sen.j: 青葉山ろく公園（あおばさんろくこうえん）は、京都府舞鶴市の青葉山山麓に整備された公園。
sen.e: Located in Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture, Aobasanroku-koen is a park at the foot of Aoba-san Mountain.
Located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Aobasanroku-koen is a park at the foot of Aoba-san Mountain.
Located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Aobasanroku-koen is a park at the foot of Mt. Aoba.

sen.j: 別名若狭富士と呼ばれ、自然豊かな青葉山でキャンプやアスレチック、18ホールのパターゴルフ、野外体験授業が楽しめる公園で、休日などにはピクニックなどの家族連れで賑わう。
sen.e: This park is crowded with families on a picnic on holidays, because one can enjoy camping, field athletics, putter golf of eighteen holes, and outdoor experience classes at the foot of Aoba-san Mountain, nicknamed 'Wakasa Fuji' (literally Mt. Fuji in Wakasa as its shape is similar to Mt. Fuji) and blessed with rich natural environment.

During holidays and weekends this park is full of families having picnics, taking advantage of the extensive facilities which include camping, field athletics, an eighteen-hole miniature golf course, and outdoor experience classes, at the foot of Aoba-san Mountain, which is nicknamed 'Wakasa Fuji' (literally 'Wakasa Mt. Fuji' as its shape is similar to Mt. Fuji) and is blessed with rich natural environment.
sen.cmt: Changed for clarity, word choice and grammar.
sen.e: During holidays and weekends this park is full of families having picnics, taking advantage of the extensive facilities which include camping, field athletics, an eighteen-hole miniature golf course, and outdoor experience classes, at the foot of Mt. Aoba, which is nicknamed 'Wakasa Fuji' (literally 'Wakasa Mt. Fuji' as its shape is similar to Mt. Fuji) and is blessed with rich natural environment.

sen.j: また陶芸館もある。
sen.e: There is also a pottery house.
There is also a separate pottery house.
sen.cmt: To contrast with the activities above.
sen.e: There is also a separate pottery house.

sen.j: 入園とキャンプ、駐車場は無料。
sen.e: Admission fee: free of charge for camping and parking;
Admission fee: free of charge for camping and parking.
Admission fee: free of charge for camping and parking.

sen.j: パターゴルフは大人400円、陶芸館は200円（他に付属設備使用料、粘土代等要）かかり、小人はいずれも半額。
sen.e: Putter golf: \400 for an adult; Pottery house: \200 for an adult (plus fees for using subsidiary facilities and for clay material); half price for children at the both facilities
Miniature golf costs \400 for adults, and the pottery house \200 for adults (plus fees for using subsidiary facilities and for clay material); it is half price for children at both facilities
Miniature golf costs 400 yen for adults, and the pottery house 200 yen for adults (plus fees for using subsidiary facilities and for clay material); it is half price for children at both facilities
sen.cmt: \→yenとし、余分なスペースを消去

sen.j: 所在地：〒625-0015 京都府舞鶴市字岡安
sen.e: Aza Okayasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture 625-0015
Aza Okayasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture 625-0015
Aza Okayasu, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture 625-0015

sen.j: 問合せ：電話0773-64-5454（青葉山ろく公園事務所）
sen.e: Information: phone: 0773-64-5454 (the office of Aobasanroku-koen Park)
Information: phone: 0773-64-5454 (the office of Aobasanroku-koen Park)
Information: phone: 0773-64-5454 (the office of Aobasanroku-koen Park)

sen.j: 公式サイト：http//www.aoba36kouen.org/
sen.e: Official website URL: http//www.aoba36kouen.org/
Official website URL: http//www.aoba36kouen.org/
Official website URL: http//www.aoba36kouen.org/

sen.j: 開園時間：9時00分～17時00分
休閉園日：祝日の翌日／年末年始。
sen.e: Closed: the day after a national holiday or days of year end and the New Year
Closed: the day after national holidays and also during the New Year period.
Closed: the day after national holidays and also during the New Year period.

sen.j: また、グリーンスポーツセンター（3月～11月）／パターゴルフ場（12月～3月）／ 陶芸館毎週月曜日（祝日の場合は翌々日）
sen.e: Green Sports Center: November to March; Putter Golf Park: December - March; Pottery House: every Monday (if it's a holiday, the next day)
sen.cmt: グリーンスポーツセンターは12月～2月が休みで，陶芸館は月曜が祝日の場合は翌日（火）が休み，とweb pageにあります．原文に誤りがあると思われますので，websiteにならって，訳しました．
sen.e: Green Sports Center: November to March; Miniature Golf: December - March; Pottery House: every Monday (or Tuesday if the holiday falls on a Monday)
Green Sports Center: November to March; Miniature Golf: December - March; Pottery House: every Monday (or Tuesday if the holiday falls on a Monday)

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道舞鶴東インターチェンジから国道27号に出て、鹿原信号を左折、舞鶴工業高等専門学校を過ぎてすぐ。
sen.e: From Maizuru-Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, take National Route 27, and turn to the left at Shikahara intersection, it is just beyond Maizuru National College of Technology.
From Maizuru-Higashi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, take National Route 27, and turn to the left at Shikahara Intersection; it is just beyond Maizuru National College of Technology.
From Maizuru-Higashi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, take National Route 27, and turn to the left at Shikahara Intersection; it is just beyond Maizuru National College of Technology.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道舞鶴線東舞鶴駅より京都交通バス朝来循環線に乗り、舞鶴高専前下車し徒歩約5分。
sen.e: From Higashi Maizuru Station of JR Maizuru Line, take Kyoto Kotsu Bus Aseku Junkan Route, get off at 'Maizurukosenmae' bus stop, and the park is approximately five minutes on foot.
From Higashi Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line, take Kyoto Kotsu Bus Aseku Junkan Route, get off at 'Maizurukosenmae' bus stop, and the park is approximately five minutes on foot.
From Higashi Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line, take Kyoto Kotsu Bus Aseku Junkan Route, get off at 'Maizurukosenmae' bus stop, and the park is approximately five minutes on foot.
